entry.title: Paper Kinfe
entry.summary:
Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,193Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: Dick’s fingers tightened around his glass.“Congratulations,” Marina said smoothly. “You’re already Gotham’s most powerful couple.”Jason let out a breath and leaned back. “Guess we’re stuck with each other, huh?”Dick looked at him, heart thudding slow and strange. “Guess so.”Jason tilted his head. “Ooh, you wanna kiss me so bad.”Dick rolled his eyes. “God, I hate you.” JayDickWeek 2025 Day 4: “Ooh you wanna kiss me so bad” | Mafia/Mob Boss AU | Arranged Marriage

entry.title: Nightwing fighting between armor and heart
entry.summary:
Author: locksandkeys

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,990Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Seven years since the fight with Bane. Seven years since Richard Grayson, now the legendary Nightwing—Mage Knight of the Kingdom of El—kissed Jason Todd for the first and last time behind the castle walls.Now back from a pilgrimage of magic and mystery across ancient lands, Richard returns stronger, wiser, and more respected than ever. But no title, no spell, no armor forged in dragonfire can protect his heart from the ache of knowing the man he loves remains behind enchanted bars, imprisoned for a betrayal he has long since atoned for.Torn between duty to the kingdom and loyalty to his heart, Richard must walk the razor’s edge between honor and rebellion. As constellations dance in the night sky—silent messages across prison walls—an old flame threatens to reignite beneath layers of law, legacy, and longing.In a world where kings hold grudges and magic is both salvation and weapon, will Nightwing remain the champion of the people—or risk everything for love?

entry.title: a grave in the sky (where it's roomy to lie)
entry.summary:
Author: svalas

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,897Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 110

Summary: Nightwing stood up, and the expression on his face made Spoiler step back nervously. His hand unfurled, shaking, revealing a sharp and bloody switchblade. Its body was a beautiful red. A phoenix had been carved into the side. “Somebody was here.” If his voice went any tighter it might shatter. “And we were too late.” (Again, he added in his mind. Then he flinched and had to remind himself—not Jason. Jason’s dead. Just the Joker.) or, what might have happened in UTRH if Black Mask was just a bit smarter

entry.title: Knitted Love
entry.summary:
Author: redbirdandbluebird23

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,474Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 74

Summary: Jason finishes the scarf in two weeks. It's a little wonky and there's one or two holes somehow, but it's his. It's something he made with his bare hands - the first thing he's made rather than destroyed in a long time.Once the scarf is done, he goes round to Mrs Talis' again and learns how to make a baby blanket and bonnet for Lian. They take longer, but he's determined to do it, and even if they end up a little wonky too, the look on Roy's face when he hands them over is worth it.***Jason picks up knitting and gets more than he thought he would out of it.JayDick Week 2025 Day 3: Childhood crush
